name: Dobbeldood
description:
You play as a die, evading cones and trying to get at least 30 yellow decahedrons.

Defeat red enemies with a number higher or equal than their number, blue enemies with a number lower or equal than their number, and walls by matching their exact number.

Rerolling grants you a change at a better number, but also downgrades your die, until you pick up a decahedron.

WASD / arrow keys    to move

Space    to reroll

Esc    to quit

(sorry for the messy file, theres a .exe in there somewhere, keep looking)
